name: docusaurus-openapi-typedoc
description: Docusaurus with OpenAPI and Typedoc and Lunr Search. Docs-Driven Development has docs autogenerated from code so everyone can understand the overview logic.

scripts.docs: DOCS_PATH=../docs; concurrently "npx docusaurus serve --dir $DOCS_PATH" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && opener http://localhost:3000"
scripts.make:docs: DOCS_PATH=../docs; rm -rf $DOCS_PATH; mkdir $DOCS_PATH; DOCUSAURUS_IGNORE_SSG_WARNINGS=true npx docusaurus build --out-dir $DOCS_PATH;
